missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Senator Feralo is a Rebel figure controlled by the heroes that does not activate. Senator Feralo cannot suffer {H}. Senator Feralo does not block line of sight. At the end of each hero activation, Senator Feralo gains 2 movement points. If an Imperial figure controls Senator Feralo, Senator Feralo is arrested.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he or she is incapacitated instead. When activating, he or she receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. Incapacitated heroes do not count for control of Senator Feralo.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator.
{-} The Rebel mission token is the maintenance ladder. A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to climb to the Roof.
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters the Roof.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded, or when Senator Feralo is arrested. When Senator Feralo is arrested, click the Imperial mission token and select "Senator arrested".
missionProperties.startingObjective: Get to the Roof. Protect Senator Feralo.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Be adjacent to Senator Feralo. Block access to the Roof.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Senator Feralo’s apartment is a luxurious affair, with energy shields closing off a maintenance room to the south. The senator has just started to brief you when you hear a banging on the door. Senator Feralo takes a deep breath. “They are here for me”, he says. “We need to get going.”

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator.
{-} The Rebel mission token is the maintenance ladder. A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to climb to the Roof.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Place an energy shield on each space.

eventActions.tbText: {-} Place an energy shield on each purple highlighted space.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Place 1 neutral mission token here. This is Senator Feralo.

eventActions.tbText:
Senator Feralo rises from his seat, ready to go.

{-} Place 1 neutral mission token on the green highlighted space. This is Senator Feralo.
{-} Senator Feralo is a Rebel figure controlled by the heroes that does not activate. Senator Feralo cannot suffer {H}. Senator Feralo does not block line of sight. At the end of each hero activation, Senator Feralo gains 2 movement points. If an Imperial figure controls Senator Feralo, Senator Feralo is arrested.

{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters the Roof.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded, or when Senator Feralo is arrested. When Senator Feralo is arrested, click the Imperial mission token and select "Senator arrested".

events.eventText:
Senator Feralo catches his breath and wipes sweat from his face. The now-fugitive senator thanks his daughter profusely, hugging her tightly. He promises all the aid he can give and that the information he gathered will be useful.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Ko-Tun Feralo receives the “Alliance Efficiency” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

The Imperials grab Senator Feralo and withdraw as quickly as they appeared. Attempts to console Ko-Tun bring only a terse reply: "He knew the risks."

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

With a soft hum, the elevator arrives at the Penthouse.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the elevator can spend 2 movement points to move the elevator (tile 33A) and all figures and tokens on it to the Roof. Click the highlight and select "Move to Roof".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Roof.

The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator.

events.eventText:
With a soft hum, the elevator arrives at the roof.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the elevator can spend 2 movement points to move the elevator (tile 33A) and all figures and tokens on it to the Penthouse. Click the highlight and select "Move to Penthouse".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Penthouse.

The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Roof.

A maintenance ladder leads up to the Roof.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to place the figure on the Roof ladder.

A maintenance ladder leads up to the Roof.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to place the figure on the Roof ladder.

eventActions.tbText: {-} Place your figure on the blue Rebel mission token. This is the Roof Ladder.
Heavy wind sprays your face with rain. The neon-soaked silhouette of Coruscant looms over you. At the edge of the roof, the getaway shuttle awaits. But you are not alone. Enemies rush towards you.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shuttle's engines are already humming, ready to get away.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, select "Enter".

eventActions.tbText: {-} The blue highlighted spaces are the Getaway Shuttle. The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Enter".

events.eventText: At the northern side of the Roof, an elevator stands open.

With a soft hum, the elevator arrives at the Penthouse.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the elevator can spend 2 movement points to move the elevator (tile 33A) and all figures and tokens on it to the Roof. Click the highlight and select "Move to Roof".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Penthouse.

The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Roof.

A maintenance ladder leads up to the Roof.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to place the figure on the Roof ladder.

eventActions.tbText: Heavy wind sprays your face with rain. The neon-soaked silhouette of Coruscant looms over you. At the edge of the roof, the getaway shuttle awaits. But you are not alone. Enemies rush towards you.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shuttle's engines are already humming, ready to get away.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, select "Enter".

eventActions.tbText: {-} The blue highlighted spaces are the Getaway Shuttle. The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Enter".

eventActions.repositionText: Be adjacent to Senator Feralo. Block access to the Getaway Shuttle.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Senator Feralo is a Rebel figure controlled by the heroes that does not activate. Senator Feralo cannot suffer {H}. Senator Feralo does not block line of sight. At the end of each hero activation, Senator Feralo gains 2 movement points. If an Imperial figure controls Senator Feralo, Senator Feralo is arrested.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he or she is incapacitated instead. When activating, he or she receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. Incapacitated heroes do not count for control of Senator Feralo.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator.
{-} A figure on or adjacent to any ladder may spend 2 movement points to move to the other ladder.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Enter".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters the shuttle.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded, or when Senator Feralo is arrested. When Senator Feralo is arrested, click the Imperial mission token and select "Senator arrested".

events.eventText: ”Not so fast!”, shouts a trooper waiting in ambush. “You Rebel scum aren’t getting away that easily!” The shuttle is full of Imperial forces!

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shuttle's engines are already humming, ready to get away.

{-} When Senator Feralo and all heroes are on the Getaway Shuttle and there are no Imperial figures on the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Launch" to launch the shuttle and win the mission.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Senator Feralo is a Rebel figure controlled by the heroes that does not activate. Senator Feralo cannot suffer {H}. Senator Feralo does not block line of sight. At the end of each hero activation, Senator Feralo gains 2 movement points. If an Imperial figure controls Senator Feralo, Senator Feralo is arrested.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he or she is incapacitated instead. When activating, he or she receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. Incapacitated heroes do not count for control of Senator Feralo.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator.
{-} A figure on or adjacent to any ladder may spend 2 movement points to move to the other ladder.
{-} When Senator Feralo and all heroes are on the Getaway Shuttle and there are no Imperial figures on the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Launch" to launch the shuttle.
{-} The Rebels win when the shuttle launches.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded, or when Senator Feralo is arrested. When Senator Feralo is arrested, click the Imperial mission token and select "Senator arrested".

eventActions.tbText:
{-} When Senator Feralo and all heroes are on the Getaway Shuttle and there are no Imperial figures on the Getaway Shuttle, click the Getaway Shuttle and select "Launch" to launch the shuttle.
{-} The Rebels win when the shuttle launches.

The Imperials’ comlinks crackle with static, but you can clearly hear the troops below rushing towards the roof.

{-} Place all Imperial figures from the Penthouse on the Roof, evenly distributed between the ladder and the spaces before the elevator.
{-} Then, each figure that was placed suffers 1 {H}, unless this would be the last {H} needed to defeat it.

eventActions.repositionText: Be adjacent to Senator Feralo. Be on the Getaway Shuttle.

mapEntities.mainText:
The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Roof.

The elevator door is shut tight.

{-} A figure adjacent to the elevator door may spend 2 movement points to call the elevator to the Penthouse.
{-} A figure on or adjacent to the elevator can spend 2 movement points to move the elevator (tile 33A) and all figures and tokens on it to the Roof.
{-} A figure on or adjacent to the elevator can spend 2 movement points to move the elevator (tile 33A) and all figures and tokens on it to the Penthouse.

A maintenance ladder leads up to the Roof.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to climb up to the Roof.

A maintenance ladder leads down to the Penthouse.

{-} A figure on or adjacent to the ladder may spend 2 movement points to place the figure on the Penthouse ladder.
{-} When Senator Feralo is arrested, click the Imperial mission token and select "Senator arrested".
Place 1 neutral mission token here. This is Senator Feralo.
Place an energy shield on each space.

The shuttle's engines are already humming, ready to get away.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the Getaway Shuttle, select "Enter".
